alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Geneva, northwestern Jackson, northern Walton, Holmes and central Washington Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Florala, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Graceville, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads and Cerrogordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
